item.title: The Supreme Court raises the stakes on Trump’s troop deployments
item.description: The decision risks the president invoking the Insurrection Act to deploy the regular military.

item.title: Charlie Kirk was killed on her campus. This is what happened next.
item.description: After Charlie Kirk’s death on her campus, Utah Valley University president Astrid Tuminez found herself in an impossible position. She was at the helm of Utah’s largest public university and had to find a way to lead her campus after the tragedy. Now, at the end of the fall semester, she joins host Megan McArdle to discuss how her faith, upbringing and love for her community gave her the strength and wisdom to get through. Plus, she shares the lessons she learned through the process to help other leaders — including the president of Brown University — who may find themselves in a similar position.
